mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE NO IN ( SELECT NO FROM ( SELECT NO , LEVEL AS LVL FROM BOARD START WITH NO = #{no} CONNECT BY PRIOR NO = PARENT_NO ) )
